summary: 25 Days Of Christmas: Day 10: Daddy Claus fluff - kids - words 800 .-.-.-. “Harry,” you whispered.   Harry wasn’t supposed to...
caption:
25 Days Of Christmas:

Day 10: Daddy Claus

fluff - kids - words 800

.-.-.-.

“Harry,” you whispered.

Harry wasn’t supposed to fall asleep but he was across from you in the bed, Ivy half sprawled across his chest both of them snoring their heads off as they slept peacefully.

“Harry,” you tried again being very careful not to be too loud.

Somehow you had to wake him up without waking Ivy as well. It was almost midnight and she had only just fallen asleep a few moments ago. Bless her little heart, trying to stay up so she could see Santa, sleep fighting her small body.

“M’ sleeping.” He says carefully, trying not to move to much and wake Ivy. His eyelids were fluttering slightly but he didn’t open his eyes.

Shaking your head, you smiled gently at him. “Santa doesn’t sleep.”

“He does when he has a two-year-old on him.” He run his thumb gently over her hand that was resting over one of his swallow tattoos.

“You promised,” Sitting up, you carefully pulled Ivy from his chest and he groaned in frustration at the loss of her. Pressing Ivy’s warm body against your chest you shifted out of bed. “Every year, until the kids know, you will dress as Santa to put the presents out. Are you really going to upset your most obsessed Christmas child on the first one where she knows what’s going on?”

“She’s not going to know.” His green eyes opened and he shifted over in the bed to look at you.

“I will, now get up and I’ll put her in her bed.” Kicking the bed to jostle him you left the room, Harry laughing quietly.

“Coal in the stocking for you.”

…

Once you got Ivy settled in her bed you made your way downstairs to the living area, the soft glow of the lights on the tree filling the room. Harry was dragging out the bag of presents from the hiding space in his office, dressed head to toe in a very perfect and maybe slightly to expensive Santa suit that you bought the year you were pregnant with Fee.

“Why Santa, you’ve lost weight.” Sneaking up behind him you put a hand over his back, the velvet of the suit tickling against the palm of your hand.

“Well, if my little helper stopped having kids then I wouldn’t have to carry so many presents around.” Dropping the bag, he turned around to look at you, a tired smile on his face.

“I’m not the problem Santa, my husband loves sex too much.”

Harry smirked beneath the white beard, green eyes moving to you for a quick second. “Sounds like a really good husband.”

Opening the bag of toys up, you rolled your eyes at him but still helped him to spread all the presents out underneath the tree. Stepping back, you admired all the presents you had collected. All of Ivy’s presents were at the front because she learnt how to read her name, only so she could find all her presents under the tree herself, so she had told you multiple times.

“Thank you,” you whispered as you cuddled in close to his side.

A chuckle vibrated through his chest and you tightened your arms around him. He may have complained but he enjoyed putting the suit on every Christmas, even if the kids never saw it the both of you liked the idea that Santa really did put the presents under the tree.

“Anytime, my little helper,” He pulled you in for a tighter hug but not before tugging down the white beard, showing his own little stubble hidden beneath. “Maybe you can sit on Santa’s lap now.”

“Santa!” You exclaimed but were cut off.

Leaning down he pressed a kiss against your lips, hands tightening against your back. Pushing up onto your toes you sunk your fingers into his curls, hidden beneath his hat. You felt the hint of a smile pull at his lips as his hand slipped down further down you back until he was cupping your ass.

“Mummy!”

Whipping around you saw Ivy, standing half way down the stairs, little hand tightly locked around the railings because she wasn’t supposed to be on the stairs by herself. Her eyes were watering staring down at you as you pushed away from Harry, who quickly pulled the beard back up to hide his face. It would destroy her if she found out about Santa so early. You didn’t even know what to say to her.

As quickly as she could, she turned and made her way back upstairs, her teddy clenched tightly in her arms. Harry was turned around to face the tree, back to the stairs and once the sound of Ivy’s footsteps was gone, he looked back at you.

“Ivy saw mummy kissing Santa Claus.” He said through a quick exhale.

Day 10: Daddy Claus

fluff - kids - words 800

.-.-.-.

“Harry,” you whispered.

Harry wasn’t supposed to fall asleep but he was across from you in the bed, Ivy half sprawled across his chest both of them snoring their heads off as they slept peacefully.

blog.name: toomanylarrytears
blog.title: practice what you preach
blog.description: 18. bi. law student. fanfiction writer. new work coming very soon!

summary:
The Compulsion to Find Love by Toomanytears 
The most prestigious English third-level institution, Candling University, accepts...
body:
The Compulsion to Find Love by Toomanytears

The most prestigious English third-level institution, Candling University, accepts omega students for the first time and Louis Tomlinson applies with bright eyes and brighter ambitions. There he encounters personal obstacles, traditional mindsets and a beautiful boy who inverts every prejudice Louis has ever known.

(Currently on over 1200 kudos! Thank you all :) I’m just posting this because Evelyn made me this beautiful moodboard.)

(Update: almost on 1300 kudos. I’m truly blown away by the response to my fic. Thank you all!)

blog.name: pendantstyles
blog.title: you bring me home
blog.description:
hannah | vision isn’t 20/20, but harry is!!

+ requests are always open! +

masterlist

summary: YES WHINY H IN A BATHTUB TRYING TO SPLASH Y/N AND POUTING WHEN SHE SCOLDS HIM
question: YES WHINY H IN A BATHTUB TRYING TO SPLASH Y/N AND POUTING WHEN SHE SCOLDS HIM
answer:
“harry!”

your stern scold when you’re finally drenched leaves him powerless, stopping yet with complaint still seen on his face — a pout and a frown being clearly seen.

“whaaaaat?”

he drags out as he scowls at you, crossing his arms across his chest as he kicks his feet against the tub, slouching so that he’d sink in to the water more to avoid your burning glare.

he looks like a little pet guilty as charged, completely told off as he finally realizes through his hazy mind that you’re mad at him, a little sorry glare on his face as he just listens to you; sounding completely tired.

“no more bath time for you.”
